text: Federal Route 150, or Jalan Paaboi, is a federal road in Penang, Malaysia. ==Features== At most sections, the Federal Route 150 was built under the JKR R5 road standard, allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h. ==List of junctions== {|class="wikitable" |- !km||Exit||Junctions||To||Remarks |- | || ||Bukit Tambun|| Jalan Bukit Tambun West Batu Kawan North–South Expressway Northern Route Bukit Kayu Hitam Penang Kuala Lumpur Ipoh East Simpang Ampat||T-junctions |- | || ||Taman Urai Jaya|| || |- | || ||Taman Merak|| || |- | 0|| ||Paaboi||North Butterworth Bukit Mertajam South Taiping Nibong Tebal Sungai Bakap||T-junctions |} ==References== Category:Malaysian Federal Roads
title: Malaysia Federal Route 150
